location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morley, East India Company Resident at Bushire, to Captain Thomas Farmer, Commander in Chief of the Company's Marine Force in the Gulph of Persia [Persian Gulf]

mods.abstract: The letter is an order for the Eagle, the Fancy, and the Dolphinto patrol between Bushire and Cape Verdistan [approximately 100 miles SE Bushire, near Bardestan] under the command of Captain McKenly.
